metadata.Title: CVE-2020-3811 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: qmail-verify as used in netqmail 1.06 is prone to a mail-address verification bypass vulnerability. It was discovered that netqmail did not properly handle certain input when validating email addresses. An attacker could use this to bypass email address validation.

criterions.comment: netqmail: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
